title: The $599 MacBook e is Real: Apple’s ‘Chromebook Killer’ Revealed
description: Apple is preparing to introduce a new budget-friendly MacBook in 2026, with an anticipated price range of $599 to $699. This device, potentially named the MacBook E, MacBook SE, or MacBook Mini, is designed to appeal to students, families, and casual users se…
